front.title: IEEE Standard for Common Incident Management Message Sets for Use by Emergency Management Centers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The purpose of the IEEE 1512 Implementation Guide is to provide guidelines for and assistance with the implementation process of IEEE Std 1512. This guide presents information and examples on how to facilitate the development of needs, requirements, and design content that can be used during the procurement, implementation, and verification phases of the system life cycle for projects that use IEEE Std 1512.
